node.title: When are you moving to India to find a better job?
node.author: DrWhy

data.field: Next month. Next year. When the company decides to outsouce my boss's job, so I can get him to train me to replace him. I already have a great job in India! When Mumbai freezes over. After I finish this Hindi-on-Tape course. Where's India? Dood. India's old nooz. I'm packin' my bags for SeaCode!
